casebody.data:
Charles David BECTON
v.
J. HALL, Superintendent of Harnett Correction, N.C. Department of Corrections. No. 502P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 18, 2006. Charles David Becton, Pro Se. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, for Harnett Corrections.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Plaintiff on the 13th day of September 2006 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of September 2006."
